comments.raw_text: We have an enum for all token kinds, and we then repeat every token kind in a function to convert a token kind to a C string in DEBUG code.  A table would let us not repeat ourselves quite so much (although it would have the problem that it wouldn't let us treat TOK_LIMIT as not a valid token kind).
